publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5719 Kenny MacAskill: Bribery Bill - UK Legislationâ€”That the Parliament agrees that the relevant provisions of the Bribery Bill, introduced in the House of Lords on 19 November 2009, relating to bribery and corruption, so far as these matters fall within the legislative competence of the Scottish Parliament, should be considered by the UK Parliament. Supported by: Fergus Ewing*
